result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:24 a.m.
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 22CF905, 22CF919, and 22CF1095

State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo for DDA Molly Lawrence. Defendant appears in person, in custody from the MCJ, with Atty John Wallace.

Waiver of Prelim filed.
Court questions Defendant as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.

COURT finds probable cause. Defendant bound over for arraignment and trial.
Information to be e-filed. R/W; R/J.
PLEA>> NOT GUILTY.

DATES: 
Previously calendared
RH - 9/28/22 at 8:30 a.m.

ADJ: 9:29 a.m.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 1:06 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CF905, 22CF1095 & 22CF919.

Deft appears via video, in custody, pro se.  
Date and time set for review re: public defender representation prior to preliminary hearing. 
Court notes Attorney John Wallace has been appointed.
Prelim set for 09/21/2022 @ @ 9:10 am, Branch 6. 

Adj: 1:07 pm.

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 2:32 pm. 
INCLUDES: 22CF905, 22CF919, 22CF1095.
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall. Defendant appears from MCJ, pro se. 
Date and Time set for AIA; VRCW. 

Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

Prelim Time Limits Preserved. 
PO HOLD.

COURT ORDERS: $5,000 cash bond (continued) - CONDITIONS:  
- Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of alcohol. 
- Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of controlled substances, except prescriptions taken as prescribed. 
- No driving without a valid license. 

- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  715-841-0400

>>FUTURE DATES: 
PH: 9/21 at 9:10
RH: 9/16 at 1


Adj: 2:37 pm.

INCLUDES 22CF905, 22CF919, 22CF1095: Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

INCLUDES 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919.  No contact with any victims identified in the complaint.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  Shall have his/her fingerprints and photograph taken at the Sheriff's Dept.

Clerk:  Amy. 
Called:  2:21 p.m. 
INCLUDES 21CF1150, 21CF1201, 22CF281, 22CF282, 22CF773, 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919.
State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski.  Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, pro se.

Atty Cannon states deft did not want to meet with SPD today.  

Initial appearance on 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919>>
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Defendant states he received complaints but has been too impaired to understand them. 
COURT finds probable cause in all new cases.  
COURT adjourns matters for defendant to read and understand recent charges. 

COURT sets IA for 9/12/22 at 2:00 p.m., Branch 5.  

BOND:  $5000.00 cash to include 22CF1095, 22CF905, 22CF919.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with any victims identified in complaint.  
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Prints and photograph.

Clerk Marisa.

Review hearing on September 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
